website_summaries.verdict: Offers some nice features, but there are issues with quality that concern owners - especially considering the price.
pros: A easy-to-assemble, spacious model that's weather-resistant
Owners comment that it's the perfect mid-size
cons: Some screws and holes don't line up properly, and flooring is less stable than it could be

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for a storage unit that leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Sliding top is a nice feature as well as the double doors. Contrary to the instructions, I found it reasonable to assemble by myself. None of the parts are heavy. What I am disappointed in, is the fact it leaks and retains water when it rains! I have it on a level gravel base with pavers. It's pricey to leak!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shed and it wasn't supposed to be here until September 12th. I got it on the 6th. I was super stoked! Took everything out to get it constructed and was missing 1 right side and 1 front. I had an extra left side and an extra back piece. Super frustrating. I contacted Suncast and they didn't seem too concerned or in a real hurry to help me out. They said they would send me the 2 pieces I'm missing but it would take another 7-10 business days. I guess this happens often just based on their crappy response to me. I'll update once I receive the missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleTee

customer_reviews.title: First Impression -- Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and looks great. Seems pretty solid. We'll see how it stands up to the weather over the next year. Inside volume is about what I expected. We can park two adult and one child bike in it with ease, but not much else (see the pic).
customer_reviews.author: E. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage for Restricted Spaces
customer_reviews.text: This shed fits perfectly under my deck which only has 54" clearance from the ground to the under side of the deck. I built a platform using 2 x 6 treated lumber for the frame and 5/4 treated lumber for the top. At the moment, I'm storing my brush chipper, snow blower, tractor snow plow blade, power washer, string trimmer, hand truck and various shovels and rakes. Soon I'll bring out the winter equipment and store my lawn mower and leaf blower. I was able to assemble the shed by myself in about 45 minutes. Homeowner restrictions prohibit structures elsewhere on the property, but this shed is the perfect stealth solution to my storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, quality control is lacking
customer_reviews.text: The unit is sturdy and really easy to assemble. It took me about an hour. The major issue is that there is a hole in the stationary lid (or roof) of the shed that appears to be a short shot that was created during manufacturing. How did this get past inspection at Suncast? Of all the parts in the assembly, the most critical component (the roof) has the hole in it... how ironic. Now to deal with getting that resolved... UPDATE 8/30/19 - I called Suncast and after 15 minutes of waiting on the phone for an agent, they agreed to ship a replacement part to me. It will take 7-10 days to receive. No questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I received my shed yesterday put it together in about a hour and a half by myself and I'm pleased! This is the perfect shed for my needs! I already have a small shed but needed to clear floor space! One word of advice make sure it's level! Mine was off a little bit which caused a minor problem when I got to installing and closing the doors! Had to shim it up maby a half a inch! No biggie! Lawn mower,snow blower, weed whacker, gas cans shovels,bags of weed n feed all neatly inside. I still have room it's perfect! Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Description
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about the quality of this item, but I do know that the product description is misleading or, at best, incomplete. The installation requires a separate base of either concrete or wood frame which was not disclosed in the descripton of "REINFORCED FLOOR: Heavy-duty floor is designed to withstand abuse, supporting your lawn mower or other heavy equipment". I am a 80+ senior who purchased this item believing that it was complete and required assembly, not fabrication.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C. Evans

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for a while now. I say: Great shed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small shed that allow me to store a backup generator and accessory when not in use Well it did that and have a lot of space left for much more. The sliding portion of the roof is a very neat feature that is saver to your back. No need to bend anymore. I did not give 5 stars for 2 reasons: 1- the locking hole for the padlock is a flimsily plastic with no reinforcement of whatsoever, rendering the whole idea useless. 2-the gliding roof catches from time to time. you have to wiggle it few times to work properly. This said I am thinking of buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: lanhobby

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a common issue with this product. Mine arrived with 4 rear panels and no front panels. It was a bit of a pain getting this fixed. Amazon ended up sending me another one and told me to take what pieces I need from that and they will take it back. Other than that this is a great shed.
customer_reviews.author: J. MORRISON

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but is just OK
customer_reviews.text: I have some issues... one of the plastic screws near the door is stripped, so one of my doors doesn’t hang properly. Also there’s a dent in the roof. It’s too big and too much work to bother with returning, so I guess I have to live with it. It gets the job done. Stores all the stuff and is sized well for what I need. I put it in a hidden spot though, because it’s big and plastic, and not very appealing to see in a nice yard. Can’t say I’m super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Product shipment has MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: As a result of a clear oversight from the manufacturing plant, I received 2 identical #0440641 "Left" parts instead of one "Left" and one "Right" part. This is part of the Roof Guide Assembly. Suncast is making it very difficult to obtain the correct part, even though this should be an easy fix. Do not do business with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Kreutter

customer_reviews.title: Great shed.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. BUT it did not come with the metal screws and washers that were listed on the equipment list. That was no big deal, just went to Bi-mart and bought them. My best friend and I put it together. It was pretty easy and self-explanatory. BUT the left door did not line up with the bracket, so the "easy bolts" would not screw in. Called the company and they sent out extra longer bolts that worked great. The short ones just would not catch. The long ones did. Now it's perfect. Top slides easy. Able to put a 2" 5/16 padlock on it for security. Looks great in my yard. It is sitting on a gravel pad.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Diamond

customer_reviews.title: MORE ATTRACTIVE & STURDY THAN STORAGE SHEDS THAT COST TWICE AS MUCH AT HOME DEPOT & LOWES
customer_reviews.text: Once a solid, leveled base for this storage shed was in place (we used stone to level the area slightly larger than the shed and a pressure-treated wood frame to hold the stone in place) the rest was a snap to put together. Great product. This size storage shed large enough for almost all your yard maintenance items such as a push lawnmower, weed whacker, edgers, snowblower, etc. (note: If you want to store a riding mower you will need the next size up. Same goes for a large wheelbarrow due to their awkwardness.)
customer_reviews.author: NonnaDonna

customer_reviews.title: It is Solid
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers complained it is not because they stripped plastic screws etc. If you assemble it properly it is solid. I know. I am using it for something way beyond specs. I have a flat trailer I use to haul my utility tractor. I also need a covered trailer to haul trash to the dump. Rather than buy a second trailer, I strap this on my flat trailer to make it a covered one. It handles wind, jostling, everything just fine. Well designed, well built, well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Private1

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, and Great Design!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our two small dogs. My husband added a doggy door and an a/c, and it works great as a dog house. I was concerned that it would need a window, but the doggy door lets in a lot of light. We put a plug in the ceiling for a nightlight, which provides just enough light at night. Overall, I was very impressed with the finished result, and my husband was impressed with the quality and design of the shed. The sliding feature on the roof will help make it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The shed arrived as promised. I am a retired female with a small frame. I was able to put the shed together by myself. It took me about 1 1/2 - 2 hours. Someone stronger would be able to put it together in a little less time. It held a lot more than I though it would. The gliding top made it so much easier to load things into it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Fresa

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly makes this shed a win.
customer_reviews.text: This thing went together surprisingly easily in about 1-2 hours. The instructions were good, and assembly was pretty much problem-free, as most parts fit exactly as designed (attaching the left and right side walls to the floor required some coercion via my shoe and a mallet). The shed feels very solid. I'll have to see how it holds up to weather, but so far, it seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: David Baron

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5 star item if no parts are missing. I'm salty since I was missing the bolts that screw through the doors and into the handles. That means I have to drag my butt to the hardware store with handles in hand to find bolts that fit. Other than that admittedly minor annoyance the assembly was easy and it seems sturdy enough. If still buy it again, even without the handle hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest of horizontal storage shed that i found. I didnt want a huge shed next to my house but wanted to store some bulky things thats stealing space in my garage like snow blower, generator. This is very easy and even fun to assemble. I used pavers over gravel as my base. One person can build this without assistance. This is sturdy and handsome. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: eid8801

customer_reviews.title: Great Shed with lots of Room!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking a long time for a shed that would fit my equipment, look good and cost an Arm & Leg. My HOA has very strict rules on Sheds that are over the fence line, so this shed is perfect. Two person assembly took just about an hour and was very easy. Instructions are well-written. My only suggestion/complaint is that I wish the floor was a bit sturdier. The plastic on the roof is very thick and sturdy and I feel the floor should have been that way as well. I will put some 2x6's under to provide some support and go from there... Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Campanelli

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR BIKES
customer_reviews.text: We specifically purchased this for our mt bikes and they do not fit. :( We could barely get the weed eater to lay down. It will hold a small mower and weed eater at best without much room for anything else. If you want to store your adult size bikes and stands (our bikes don't have kickstands) then get a bigger shed. It did go together pretty easily but I don't think it will be too weather proof and def not bug proof as there are many gaps and holes for critters.
customer_reviews.author: hybridstigmata

customer_reviews.title: This shed is great but...
customer_reviews.text: Was very annoyed that this was shipped with two left sliding bars instead of a left and a right. I had friends over to help put it together and had to stop. Of course it was on a weekend and I couldn't call customer service until Monday. I will say they shipped out a right and a left quickly = but of course I was then left with two heavy bars to be thrown away - what a waste! But the shed is great and holds my three bicycles and keeps them clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: It is east to put together.
customer_reviews.text: 4 star because the delivery window was a bit longer than I expected. Easy to put together all pcs line up. I bought it for bike storage- 2 standard adult ones and 1 adult tricycle- it was tight, mainly due to handle bars height. We had to build a foundation- that was the hardest part. If you already have a concrete slab or foundation- it is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Don't know about durability yet. But as for ease of assembling, that I can testify to. I'm a 58 yr old woman who assembled this in about 4 hours by myself. My floor base was about 4 inches from the corner of the fence in our yard and above grade so I did need help lifting it on to the base. But, I probably could have managed sliding it on by myself if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: greyhoundmom

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This shed was packaged properly and arrived in perfect condition via motor freight (Prime free shipping!). I built a wooden base similar to Suncast's design supported by concrete paving stones. Assembly was very easy. Working alone and at a leisurely pace I was done in less than 2 hours. Of course, building the base took a lot longer. After a couple of months use, I'm very happy with this shed. It's solid, keeps my stuff dry, the doors and lid work smoothly, and it looks pretty good. It's big enough to store my lawnmower, pressure washer, string trimmer, blow/vac, and a surprisingly large amount of other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: factoryguy

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell, but the shed looks and assembles like a quality product that will last. Assembly was straight forward and took maybe 45 mins from box opening to final cleanup. At this point, satisfied with the product and would recommend to anyone looking for a small shed for storage. I put a cub cadet lawn tractor in it and it just fits with little room for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much we purchased second
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and sheds and I picked this one because it wasn’t tall enough to catch any wind and it had a low profile so the homeowners association with containers. It is a quality product that was easy to put together and took us less than an hour. It is such a great product that we bought a second one. And that one only took about 20 or 30 minutes to put together. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Can’ t think of anything negative about this product. Have only had it a short time so the durability rating is based on the construction of the shed. Even though the instructions show using two people for some of the steps during assembly, I did all of it by myself easily. Hardly took any time at all and very few tools required.
customer_reviews.author: Wildmanjp

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor storage solution
customer_reviews.text: The shed went together easily by myself. I spent far more time making the wooden base per included instructions than I did assembling the shed. All parts were included and clearly marked (a few extra screws were included). It appears durable with the possible exception of the door attachment scheme. Time will tell. After a good rain yesterday, there was no evidence of water intrusion. I am using the shed to store my lawn equipment (mower, edger, trimmer, blower and gas cans).
customer_reviews.author: Mark O.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice low profile shed that sits below 6 foot walls & fences for HOA reasons.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy shed. Goes together well. Packed for shipping well. Mine was delivered by "CEVA" freight. They did a super job delivering it and the huge box was in perfect condition! Thanks guys! Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: snowboardpilot

customer_reviews.title: Solid, spacious and well- designed.
customer_reviews.text: This shed works perfectly for us. Using it in a fenced patio of an urban row house to secure bicycles and other equipment. The sliding roof makes accessing the bikes and other items easy. Very substantial, strong, weldesigned and convenient. Took me 2-3 hours to assemble working mostly alone. My wife helped place the roof pieces. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JCD

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the new shed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was able to put it together by myself, though having an extra hand would have made it a bit easier - still they said you needed two people and I was able to do it alone. It slides well and is very sturdy surviving heavy wind and rain on a couple of occasions. Stores four bicycles easily with some room for additional small items.
customer_reviews.author: TD Newman

customer_reviews.title: To keep thing dry, this shed is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for!! Holds my 5 bikes plus a few extra boxes of bicycle parts. I put it together by myself without help, and took appropriately an hour and a half. Just an note: the next day was a terrible rain storm, and when I look inside the next day, totally dry!! I’m very impressed with this shed!!
customer_reviews.author: George Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Great shed and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this thing was a breeze to put together. You still definitely need a friend to help you with putting all the pieces together, but with two people it took less than an hour from unboxing to throwing the packaging in the recycling. The shed comes together like a PlaySkool set and is relatively sturdy with a great amount of outdoor tool storage. The biggest hurdle for this whole thing was constructing a level paver base elevated off the ground so the shed could sit properly. If you just need something unassuming, resilient and spacious enough to house your lawn mower/weed whacker/garden supplies, I totally recommend this shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the husband for a Christmas present, but just assembled it yesterday. Assembly was a breeze. About an hour from start to finish. I did it by myself, with my girls playing inside the entire time. You only need a tool that comes with it and a phillips head screwdriver. We needed some type of storage unit for our backyard and I didn't want a big obtrusive shed. This one is the perfect height to sit next to our deck without being visible from above. The retractable roof is very convenient, making the deep storage user friendly and functional. I would make this purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LLBMRB

customer_reviews.title: Third one
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Suncast BMS 4900 shed I have purchased and assembled for my lot in the past 6 years (we keep acquiring too much stuff and our adult kids never come and pick up their old stuff). Relatively easy to put together and meets our HOA requirement for being shorter than the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Smyth

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty good and fairly practical
customer_reviews.text: For a plastic shed, it's pretty good and fairly practical. Delivery was timely and helpful, and I was able to assemble the shed by myself in a couple of hours. I think I spent longer on site preparation than on the assembly itself. I did have to ream out some of the slots in the bottom to make the pieces slide together properly, which added an hour right there. Once assembled, it sits below the level of my concrete-block wall so it's unaffected by wind and the HOA doesn't see it. It remains to be seen how long the plastic will hold up in the Vegas sun.
customer_reviews.author: John Simion

customer_reviews.title: Compact, spacious and super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a spacious, low profile, storage locker don't hesitate to buy this now. Super easy to construct, took me 25 minutes by myself. Fits 4 bikes maybe five if you pack it right and a lot of bike accessories. It's sturdy, functional, I'm so impressed with this. You don't need to build a platform to use it. It perfect for small spaces. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for small but roomy shed...
customer_reviews.text: Able to pick delivery date and time window, nice option. After opening box and laying our parts, took less than an hour to assemble by myself. Instructions were well written and easy to follow. Solid structure and plenty of room for: lawnmower, 4 wheel garden buggy, fertilizer spreader and miscellaneous kids outdoor toys. Happy with purchase and would recommend to anyone looking for a small but roomy outdoor shed that can be put together for the DIY minded.
customer_reviews.author: chino1978

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law has one of these, so I was familiar with them before I bought. Obviously had a rough shipping (3 penetrations of the packaging) but it was a very thick cardboard box and no damage was done to the shed. I assembled it by myself in about an hour (71-year-old, no handyman credentials whatsoever). Instructions were clear and easy to follow. I was impressed enough that I'm thinking about buying another.
customer_reviews.author: LCoates

customer_reviews.title: Hope  it does not leak
customer_reviews.text: This is very well designed with each piece is marked so that it assembles easily. It is quite sturdy when bolted to a flat surface. My only concern is the design of the front, The top does not overlap the door enough so that one must always put a lock clasp to try to keep water from getting in. So far so good, but without a driving rain from that side.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Weare

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect when ordering this I knew I needed something for outside since I lack storage space in the house. I am a youngish female that put this together alone in about an hour and 20 mins. I put it on concrete blocks because It floods in my area. One thing is that my doors don’t match up one is higher than the other might be user error or factory error or the uneven ground. I was able to put two locks on it. I’m so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kayla kelley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubt when I bought it but I was pleasantly surprised. The shed was a very good size with a solid base. Very easy to assemble with just one person. Feels sturdy to the touch. I have not had rain since having the shed so unsure how water tight it is.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The parts of the shed fit together easily and assembly went smoothly
customer_reviews.text: This shed is just what I was looking for. It fits my side-yard space perfectly and the height is below my fence line, so it complies with my HOA regulations. The instructions are clear and illustrated well. The parts of the shed fit together easily and assembly went smoothly. The shed was assembled in less than 2 hours by my daughter and me ( a 70 year-old woman). The shed was placed on a foundation of pea gravel and staked to the ground for extra security. Overall, the completed shed is sturdy and stable. This shed will serve our storage needs very nicely and help to keep our garage uncluttered. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best mini-shed I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Took only about an hour to assemble and works great. I have a lawn mower, pressure washer, and 5500w generator stored in it along with two gas cans and a 2-stroke leaf blower. Doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: RWPINTHEMIDWEST

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of space and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Has ample space for my needs. Sliding roof is very helpful and convenient. Construction was easy - took less than 2 hours by myself. 4 stars because one of the "bolts" that they supply did not reach the threads on the door, but does not hinder the use (duct tape!). Also, would have been better if there were shelving options. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: so is perfect for this kind of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Some damage to the floor section in shipment. Low enough to "hide" behind our 6 ft. fence, and holds a lawn mower, medium size snow blower, and chain saw, with room to spare. Gets all the smelly gas fueled equipment out of our garage. The shed is vented, so is perfect for this kind of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest2

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Was easy for my son and I to put together. Recommend two people to make the job more smooth. Sturdy and looks nice. Gets my lawnmower and shop vac and yard maintenance stuff out of my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Abkno

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, great customer service, very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store my lawnmower and it's perfect for that; looks great in my yard and hides unsightly equipment. More importantly it shipped to me with a missing piece so I call Suncast who happily sent the missing piece on the next shipment. Great and painless customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good purchases
customer_reviews.text: The waiting time was long but worth it. The carrier is good at taking care of both heavy boxes. Overall is an excellent purchasing experience from boxes received to completely assemble two units under my deck.
customer_reviews.author: RC@Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Hides the junk from the side yard view!
customer_reviews.text: Photo next to a 7' tall fence. Went together in a lil bit over an hour with two people. Quite sturdy, & you could climb on it if you needed to! Adore my little teeny shed, & just large enough for my stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: California Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This shed was very easy to assemble. My son and I had it put together in about an hour, and we were working under a deck so space was limited. It's very sturdy once it's together and the sliding roof is great. The door alignment was off just a bit, but it still opens and closes as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Giroux

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Best sturdy shed for the money. Packaging is excellent and easy assembly less than an hour. Need 2 people. 2 ten year olds could put this together great directions. Just love it. Bought to store My CH30 Cub Cadet fits in perfectly with room to spare ***** Excellent shed.
customer_reviews.author: Idorablo

customer_reviews.title: Simple to setup and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's very simple to put together (45 min job) and seems very sturdy too. All that is worth 4 stars but the 5th star is for customer service at Suncast. When the product arrived, it was missing a part which can be upsetting but I wasn't in a huge hurry to get it setup so I decided to see how Suncast would choose to take care of that. I called their customer support line and they shipped the part out immediately no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Suncast Shed
customer_reviews.text: We had a concrete pad poured for this shed late last summer. So far so good. It’s withheld rain and snow and no leaks. As far as sheds are concerned this one is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well I did it by myself. I thought the ground was level as I put it on bricks. Probably my fault it was so hard to line up. Hit and miss. All in all hasn’t leaked and the items inside are safe
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Very good capacity and easy to assembles
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and holds more than anticipated. I just Recently assembled so don’t have knowledge of durability over time but so far very impressed. Items stored: generator, dethacher, lawn mower, weed eater, fertilizer spreader, tree pruner, leaf blower, three level shelves, shovels and more
customer_reviews.author: Steven Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: Real good size. I can get all my outdoor equipment in it with room to spare. Only down side is the locking point does not seem to secure. Because we have had several break ins I added a wifi door alarm that hooks to me security system.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Melton

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together. My son and I did it in about an hour. The hardest work was getting the foundation like we wanted. I was able to put in 4 adult sized bikes with a little extra room.
customer_reviews.author: LostinAmerica

customer_reviews.title: al lot easier than expected
customer_reviews.text: super simple to put together, the only thing you need is a Phillips screw driver, everything else is supplied. very sturdy and more room than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Higginbottom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this shed. Absolutely love it. Great capacity, low profile, set it up easily with my 7 year old daughter. Keeps everything dry regardless of weather. Will not hold adult bikes but I have a good deal of stuff in it like lawn mower, yard tools, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to store 2 adult bikes. It works great. I was able to store a power washer also. There is room to store other items which I may do over the winter, but for now, I like the easy accessibility to the bikes. Only wish that it would have been available in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Danette Small

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a space to put garden tools, (my tiller, hose etc.) This was perfect for my needs. Assembly, much to my surprise, was as advertised, simple, straightforward, and basically easy. Every part lined up perfectly and it took 2 and a half hours to put together, with no swearing! I admit I walked around the box for two days before beginning the project, certain it would be a perfect way to ruin a day! I was wrong. Also,it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the details before starting.
customer_reviews.text: Overall seems like a good product. I needed to focus on site prep because of a slight grade in the yard. The manual description of the frame needs better measurements. Looking at their diagram you are not alerted to the placement of the 14" boards aligning with the anchor screws. I put in 6 pieces sideways to make sure the anchor screws went into 3" of wood. Also the smaller plywood cut wont align with the frame. I attached an extra 14" cut. The pictures show how my frame turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble even for a clumsy guy. Great instructions. Very solid construction. Really happy with it. Holds the lawnmower and snowblower and room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Now

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than expected. Seems very durable, but its a bit pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Hiram Seth Whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Shed
customer_reviews.text: This shed is a great value for the price.. you just have to take the time to level out the floor surface that it will be set on.... Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what we wanted pretty much what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the shed. It’s just exactly the right size for what we need. Assembly was fairly easy. We’re looking for it to last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: KevinDZuber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shed for my pool supplies
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shed for my pool supplies. Very easy to assemble. Took my wife and myself less than 2 hours. Be very sure you are on a level surface, as the doors will not close properly if not level. I built a platform as shown in instructions, which turned out great for a base, and once I got it level, everything came together perfect. Highly recommend this shed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great use if space!
customer_reviews.text: We the unit under our elevated deck. It made for excellent use of the space. It went together as directed. It was easier and faster to assemble than expected. The hardest part was leveling our location. Rain has gotten in it either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put it together myself
customer_reviews.text: It holds two adult bicycles plus an adult tricycle, so was perfect for my needs. My only complaint is that some of the pieces did not fit together as well as they should have. I was able to put this together myself, but it definitely would have been easier with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage shed
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and seems solid. We put our three adult bikes and the bike hitch in it. Protects the bikes from the desert heat and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Basil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: No special tools needed to put this together. My girlfriend and I did it in less than an hour. The unit itself is excellent - very handy for bikes, in particular, with the sliding top. Highly recommend this type of shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Directions were good. Put it together by myself on a concrete pad, in under 2 hours from start to finish. Just had a very wet winter, even a little rare snow, contents stayed dry. Once assembled, very sturdy, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. My German Shepherd stands on top of it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a year and a half. Holds 3 bikes with room for some other small items. Makes more room in garage. We use the bikes often so has to be easy to get them in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and durable. Be sure to build a pad for the shed. I made mine from railroad ties and gravel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assemble--Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love Suncast outdoor storage products. This shed was very easy to assemble which I did alone in under 3 hours. Also, it has not leaked, and it has gone through a very heavy rain storm and numerous waterings from the sprinkler system. I have been able to store two adult bicycles, a set of shelves, folding chairs, and numerous yard tools in varying sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Retired in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Shed
customer_reviews.text: Great little shed holds alot and fits under my deck. I like it so much I'm getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: MartyFrenich

customer_reviews.title: Fit and finish is great but not excellent
customer_reviews.text: There was hardware missing but Suncast quickly resolved that issue. Fit and finish is great but not excellent. Overall I am happy with the product. It is very well thought out. I would still recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: MP87

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shed. It was easy to put together and fit more than I thought it could.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Bella

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storage under our second story deck. My husband built a frame and filled it with pea gravel leveled out. We bought two and put them end to end, he assembled them himself while I was at work, had no trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely feel compelled to leave a review but this product takes the cake. The instructions are VERY clear. From start to finish it only took 2 hours. I assembled it by myself. It would have been helpful to have a second person but no one was available. I built a base and secured the shed to the base. It is very sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size in our small backyard. Solid, watertight, and easily assembled. Sliding top is extremely convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Noah J. Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Great Shed
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble took one person me 2 hours to assemble no issues, very pleased with quality
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shed for the the price.
customer_reviews.text: I found this shed simple to assemble and fairly sturdy once together. As others have stated, a flat level surface should be used. I’d buy this again and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Arjay

customer_reviews.title: Great shed!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, great little shed and super easy to put together. I think it took us longer to unpack the box than it did to build the shed. Very good directions and the pieces were well labeled.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Just like the reviews said it went together easily and I’m very happy with it. I laid it over paver stones with a sand base. I store my lawnmower, weed eater, blower, hedge trimmer, pool chair and cushions in it. Stays dry inside when it rains. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shed!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived when scheduled. I hired a handyman to put it together. We read the previous reviews and the specs to get the materials needed. It does require a platform and my handyman purchased the wood and assembled the platform, put the shed together and secured it to the platform. It's larger inside than I thought and looks great and is sturdy. If someone is looking for a shed this size, this is the one to get. I'm extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: n.e.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shed. Easy to put together until the final steps when the doors go on. The screws need to be bigger. We had to file down some plastic for it to fit. Otherwise I love it. We put it on concrete blocks and added shelves to it with wingnuts to hold them
customer_reviews.author: Big vic

customer_reviews.title: Very Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Holds my generator with room to spare. Sliding roof a nice feature
customer_reviews.author: John D. Sims

customer_reviews.title: and Horrible coastal weather systems
customer_reviews.text: First off- I live in Southeast Louisiana which is prone to high water, heavy rain, and Horrible coastal weather systems. I have had this unit for 12 months with no leaks or warping due to the heat exposure. It was an easy assembly. I purchased two 3300 lb capable pallets for a foundation and it is awesome. It holds generators, lawn gear, storage totes, and lawn equipment with no problem. The sliding top allows for easy access and it is lockable. I cannot give it high enough marks!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: It’s delivered by an LTL carrier. So be prepared for a tractor trailer to show up at your door.
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for a space behind our attached garage to our house. Our HOA does not allow “sheds” so this was what I felt to be a storage unit(box). It fit a lawnmower, a leaf blower ( fan blower), a pressure washer, and a backpack leaf blower in there. Maybe a few more things could fit but we didn’t want to overload it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina L. Reitz

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts 😩
customer_reviews.text: It was sent with two left side parts and needed one right and one left side. Very frustrating....
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and extremely well made. Tons of room inside.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crane

customer_reviews.title: You are getting what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little expensive; however, it was quite easy to assemble, didnt take much time to assemble, and! Now I no longer have 2 bicycles, a lawnmower, an edger, and a pressure washer in my garage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shed
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a few months now, lots of space and it’s been through some very heavy storms, still standing and waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: H D Passanha

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Shed
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy and so far this thing has done a great job. The most difficult part for me was pouring the concrete slab.
customer_reviews.author: 3dturkey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to put together, could have done by myself but had by 6 year old "help". Rainproof. Thought it would be a bit bigger, have 2 bikes, Y flicker lyft, 2 razor scooters, and small razor motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: c. spence

customer_reviews.title: Easily assembled alone.
customer_reviews.text: Paid more than I had planned but I guess it was worth it. It’s assembly system allowed me to assemble it by myself. I had it assembled and filled by the end of the same day it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: John Tamburello

customer_reviews.title: Great shed/dog house
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our dog house for the dogs in the winter. Shipping was good and fast. Product is better then some Rubbermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Riddle

product_meta.title: Suncast BMS4900 98 cu. ft. Glidetop Horizontal Storage Shed - Brown
product_meta.description: Storage space can be a problem, let the Suncast Glidetop Horizontal Shed be your solution. This medium sized 4 ft. x 6 ft. shed offers a spacious capacity of 98 cu. ft. and features wide double doors with GLIDETOP Slide Lid technology, allowing you to move and store oversized items with ease. With a sleek, low-profile design, it is the ideal compact storage space for trash cans, bikes, mowers and patio furniture. The outdoor storage shed is constructed of blow molded resin that is both durable and strong. Resin is easy to clean and will not rust or rot, for an attractive and professional-looking space that will last a lifetime.
feature_bullets: Exterior Dimensions: 4 ft. 9-1/2 in. W x 6 ft. 7-3/4 in. D x 4 ft. 4 in. H — Interior Dimensions: 4 ft. 2-1/4 in. W x 5 ft. 11-3/4 in. D x 4 ft. 1 in. H — Door opening: 46-1/4 in. W x 46-1/4 in. H — Capacity: 98 Cubic Feet — Footprint: 25 Square Feet
OUTDOOR STORAGE: A beautiful shed to store and protect your garbage cans, lawn and garden tools, snow blowers, bicycles, and more
DURABLE: Multi-walled polypropylene resin panels are engineered for long lasting strength and stability
REINFORCED FLOOR: Heavy-duty floor is designed to withstand abuse, supporting your lawn mower or other heavy equipment
UNINHIBITED ACCESS: GLIDETOP Slide Lid technology provides seamless, corner to corner access to your every belonging
LOCKABLE DOORS: Features a padlock hasp that allows doors to lock securely

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars425 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
